content.rendered:
The Southern Africa-Indian Ocean Division is divided into nine Union Conferences, three Union Missions, and one Mission. These are divided into Local Conferences, Missions, and Fields.

Unions

  1. Botswana Union Conference
  2. Indian Ocean Union Conference
  3. Malawi Union Conference
  4. Northern Zambia Union Conference
  5. South Africa Union Conference 
  6. Southern Zambia Union Conference
  7. Zimbabwe Central Union Conference
  8. Zimbabwe East Union Conference
  9. Zimbabwe West Union Conference

Union Missions

  1. Mozambique Union Mission
  2. North-Eastern Angola Union Mission
  3. South-Western Angola Union Mission

Missions

  1. São Tomé and Príncipe Mission
